name: Starship Arcade
description:
Have you ever wondered how the space looks like. Would you like to be a captain the ship in the anomaly. 

Let's board the ship and navigate the spaceship.

Drag to control the spaceship, avoid the deadly obstacles on an exciting journey.

Collect coins to unlock new characters. Starship Arcade is a simple yet exciting and

an addictive game that will keep you entertained for hours.

1. Addictive one-touch gameplay

2. Daily rewards

3. 30 starships to unlock

4. Endless game

5. Beautiful graphics

6. Addictive gameplay
